title: Create Interview with Job Description
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
expected_result: AI suggests questions based on the job description

title: Generate Job Description using Enhanced JD Feature
steps: Enter a job title (e.g. 2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
expected_result: AI generates a complete job description

title: Edit and Save Job Description
expected_result: Job description is saved and skill recommendations are displayed

title: Select Skills from AI Recommendations
steps: Select skills from the AI-recommended list
expected_result: Selected skills are saved and used for interview questions and assessments

title: Set Difficulty Level of Questions
steps: Select the difficulty level of questions (e.g. hard, moderate)
expected_result: Difficulty level is saved and used for generating interview questions

title: Create Interview with Standard and Role-Based Questions
steps: Review and customize standard and role-based questions
Add or remove questions as necessary
expected_result: Interview is created with unique public interview link

title: Verify Public Interview Link
steps: Paste the link in a new browser tab
expected_result: Public interview link is functional and displays the interview page

title: View Candidate Responses
steps: Verify that structured answers and video recordings are displayed
Verify that scores and resumes are displayed
expected_result: The responses tab displays all candidate responses, including structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes.

title: View Interview Score and Communication Score
steps: Verify that the interview score is displayed
Verify that the communication score is displayed
expected_result: The interview score and communication score are displayed for the selected candidate.

title: View AI Analysis and Interview Summary
steps: Verify that the AI analysis is displayed
Verify that the interview summary is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: The AI analysis and interview summary are displayed for the selected candidate, including observations, positives, and negatives.

title: Take Action on Candidate Response
steps: Verify that the action button is displayed
Click the action button and select 'Select' or 'Reject'
expected_result: The action button is displayed, allowing the user to select or reject the candidate.

title: Upload Resumes for Ré Screening
steps: Verify that the AI commences the screening process
expected_result: The AI initiates the screening process for the uploaded resumes.

title: View Ré Score and Recommendation
steps: Verify that the ré score is displayed
Verify that the AI recommendation is displayed
expected_result: The ré score and AI recommendation are displayed for each uploaded resume.

title: Advance or Reject Candidate based on Ré Score
steps: Verify that the option to advance or reject the candidate is displayed
Click the action button and select 'Advance' or 'Reject'
expected_result: The user can advance or reject the candidate based on the ré score and AI recommendation.
